name: DARK DAYS THE CASTING #1
summary: The Joker's surprise attack threatens to lay waste to all of Batman's carefully laid plans. Will the Dark Knight be able to regain the trust of his closest allies, Green Lantern and Duke, and prevent the forces of darkness from consuming the DC Universe?! Will Hawkman's warning stop our heroes from peering into the abyss?
info:
• 中文名: 暗黑之日：铸造
  • 出版社: DC Comics
  • 发售日: 2017-07-12
